greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the asymptotic mean of phi(k)/psi(k), where phi(k) is Euler totient function (A000010) and psi(k) is Dedekind psi function (A001615).
link: V. Sitaramaiah and M. V. Subbarao, Some asymptotic formulae involving powers of arithmetic functions, Number Theory, Madras 1987, Springer, 1989, pp. 201-234, alternative link.
mathematica: $MaxExtraPrecision = 1000; m = 1000; c = LinearRecurrence[{-2, 1, 2}, {0, -4, 6}, m]; RealDigits[(2/3) * Exp[NSum[Indexed[c, n]*(PrimeZetaP[n] - 1/2^n)/n, {n, 2, m}, NSumTerms -> m, WorkingPrecision -> m]], 10, 100][[1]]
results.author: _Amiram Eldar_, May 02 2019
